title: Cant send a gift to my friend
body: i cant send or receive a gift from my friend... we tried to add and unfriend many times but still there is nothing...please help us

replies.body: If you re-add each other as a friend, you'll have to wait through the required timer to restore eligibility.  Depending on what you're trying to gift, it's possible that your friend might not have an available pool for it.  Be sure to check out the[ Gift Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752964-Gifting-Guide-and-FAQ), and let me know if that clears things up!
ok pal tysm...so i need to be his/her friends at least for  24 hours right?
